Company: Allied Cash Advance California, LLC
Description: Allied Cash Advance agreed to pay $100,000 penalty and at least $3,709 in refunds in settlement of allegations it violated the California Deferred Deposit Transaction Law by charging excessive fees, lack of requisite disclosures, and failure to maintain records.
Agency: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation
